reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Projektimme visio on osaltamme kontribuoida kestavan kehityksen tavoitteiden toteutukseen Tansaniassa niin etta prosessit joiden kautta toteutusta koordinoidaan ovat lapinakyvia osallistavia ja hyotyvat vahvasta kansalaisjarjestoosallistumisesta. Tansania n YK-liitto ja Tansanian kansallinen kestavan kehityksen kansalaisjarjestofoorumi toimivat kansallisen ja paikallisen politiikan ja vaikuttamistyon paaasiallisina toteutuskanavina Tansaniassa. Projektikumppanit yksityissektorilta ja ruohonjuuritason organi saatioista tuovat arvokasta tietoa sisalloista ja metodeista joita kaytetaan sidosryhmia aidosti osallistavalla tavalla.

The vision of our project is to contribute to the implementation of the SDGs in these countries so that the processes through which they are coordinated are transparent inclusive and benefit from strong civil society participation. WFUNA Nairobi office at the UN Compound acts as the liaison between the East African UNAs and the UN system and facilitates sharing of learning and resources and ensures the integration of the work into its network of more than 100 UN Associations all around the world. UNA Tanzan ia and Tanzania National CSO Platform on Sustainable Development work as the main channels of implementation for national and local level policy and advocacy work in Tanzania and the various project partners from private sector to grassroot level organizat ions bring in their valuable knowledge on the contents and methods to be used in a truly multi-stakeholder manner.
